ygData.subject: Useful items - minor spoiler
ygData.msgSnippet: For any magic user there are some items wich can help you in your adventures Minor spoiler down * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ** * * 1.) Travelers backpack
ygData.messageBody:
For any magic user there are some items wich can help you in your adventures

Minor spoiler down

1.) Travelers backpack

All put in waight 75% less
Can be found as result of on quest in rivervale chance 50 against 1 ooppppss
Can be found on one of najena bosses

2.) Dimensional pounch

Magicians can summon a nice punch anything in this punch dont waight
nothing but as you camp you will lose all. can survive disconection but
only 1 hour as i heared last time so you risk if disconect

3.) runed totem staff

Goblin shamans at PAW and Blackburrow have a nice staff price is from 10 -
25 plat

So i hope to see some new addons on this list of useful things
Sandro Fanelli

http://www.tip.it/
